dnsprefix.value: <set unique dns prefix for public IP>

subnetId.value: <go to the Vnet properties and get the id> /subnets/ <subnet name>

automationRegistrationURL.value: <Go to DSC and then 'Access Keys' and get the URL>

registrationKey.value: <Go to DSC and then 'Access Keys' and get the key>

nodeConfigurationName.value: <insert the DSC configuration name you want applied>
